column2: The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Norse culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Swedish.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Norse culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Norwegian.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Norse culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Danish.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Norse culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Norman.
What will they think of next, I wonder.
What will they think of next, I wonder.
What will they think of next, I wonder.
What will they think of next, I wonder.
Welcome into the fold, my Swedish brothers and sisters.
Welcome into the fold, my Norwegian brothers and sisters.
Welcome into the fold, my Danish brothers and sisters.
Welcome into the fold, my Norman brothers and sisters.
